td.a: Spend one day doing menial labour to buy 3 Provisions?

text.p: You spend a wasted day asking around for a person with the name of Endimion, but all the people you question shake their heads and go about their business and you get nowhere. If you want to spend another day trying this same strategy, click here. Alternatively, you could try looking for a place called Endimion or start asking questions about the grey-robed men.
